mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BoardUser(id, pass, phone, gender, age) VALUES (#{id}, #{pass}, #{phone}, 'M', #{age})
INSERT INTO Article(seq, id, title, content, regdate, readCount) VALUES (seq.nextval, #{id}, #{title}, #{content}, #{regdate}, '0')
mapper.select: SELECT t2.* FROM (SELECT ROWNUM art_seq, t.* FROM (SELECT * FROM Article ORDER BY seq DESC) t) t2 WHERE t2.art_seq BETWEEN #{startRow} AND #{endRow}
